graphql.query:
mutation Register(
  $emailAddress: String!
  $fullName: String!
  $password: String!
  $dialCode: String!
  $phoneNumber: String!
  $isSpecialistPhysician: Boolean!
) {
  register(
    registerInput: {
      emailAddress: $emailAddress
      fullName: $fullName
      password: $password
      dialCode: $dialCode
      phoneNumber: $phoneNumber
      isSpecialistPhysician: $isSpecialistPhysician
    }) 
    {
    id
    message
    emailAddress
    phoneNumber
    fullName
    token
    instruction
    streamChatToken
  }
}
